Text:
If you care so little about God, why do you make the effort of posting obscene and insulting comments here? If God does not exist, why so much hatred and resentment? What are you trying to prove and to whom?

If you really want to determine whether God exists, just try... just make the effort...and ask God to give you the ability to love and clarity of mind. Ask God to forgive you for your sins.

Even if you are an atheist, just try and do the things I mentioned above (with sincerity, not out of mockery). You have nothing to lose and everything to gain...
